Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Daniel Burns
Reviews.Content: I bought a car back-up camera for a project and needed a 100 ft cable, my luck is that it came with a power supply. I was worried about signal loss, but picture still came in pretty good for having a 100 ft cable.

ProductInfo.Features:
Video power extension cable with power supply kit for CCTV security camera DVR system
100 feet video/power cables in black
12V 500mA Output with 6ft Long Cord 2.1mm Plug
Video/Power cable has BNC connectors and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 100 Feet Video Power Cable with 12V DC 500mA Power Supply Kit for CCTV Security Camera DVR System CWB
